body:
We've built and released our fourth betting Model in 2021; just in time to share **Australian Open Predictions**. 'You little beauty', as they say down here. This Model, developed by one of the sharpest sports betting data scientists in the industry, ingests dozens of tennis data sources to create probabilities for every tournament. From backyard ATP events to the Grand Slams. It distinguishes surfaces. So Rafa is going to have a different rating on clay than he is on the Australian Open hardcourt. We'll go into further details in the coming days, but let's stop wasting time and start reading the **Australian Open Predictions**. They'll populate every day of the tournament. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Predictions** As you can see, we've just got the head to head probabilities today. We'll expand the basic UX in the coming days. And then by the end of the tournament, we should have some pretty sexy outputs. For now, we'll populate the picks, and below each table will be some value betting options that stand out.
- - - ## **Mens Daily Tennis Betting Tips** The clearest Men's bet today is: **Aslan Karatsev** vs Felix Auger Aliassime Karatsev is rated a 43.63% chance by the Model, but the market is +200 ($3.00). **Grigor Dimitrov** is shorter on the Model too. So you could back him to upset Thiem or cover. **Djokovic** is the best price you'll ever see him against Raonic. The Model doesn't realize he is under an injury cloud though. That being said, if he takes the court and warms up well, we think he wins easily. Just check your sportsbook's rules on retiring. - - -
Want the **best odds on tennis**? **Join the world's biggest sportsbook.** **JOIN BET365. NOW.**
- - - ## **Australian Open Womens Predictions** Here's the head to heads, get the analysis below.
- - - ## **Womens Daily Tennis Betting Tips** * **Su-Wei Hsieh** vs Marketa Vondrousova * **Simona Halep** vs Iga Swiatek The best overlay for the day is Hsieh. Model makes her favorite, yet she's +200 ($3.00) with the books. That's a brilliant bet. And we love the sportsbook underestimating the world number two. We back Halep at the minus two starts ago, and it won, and we'll go again. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Odds** We've also got the futures markets, showing you live probabilities of each market. Here's the mens: - - - ## **Australian Open Womens Odds** - - - #### **Want tennis predictions all year? Sign up for the Wednesday email.** #### **We promise it's worth your time.**
